Fried Barry bụ  ihe nkiri mkpali egwu   South Africa nke afọ 2020 nke Ryan Kruger dere ma duzie
Ihe nkiri a nwere ihe ngosipụta mbụ ụwa ya na  Cinequest Film Festival nke afọ 2020
Ihe nkiri a gosipụtara Gary Green, Bianka Hartenstein, Sean Cameron Michael, Chanelle de Jager, Joey Cramer, na Jonathan Pienaar
Akụkọ a na-akọwa onye ọgwụ ọjọọ riri ahụ nke onye mbịarambịa weghaara ahụ ya, bụ onye na-aga njem ọṅụ site na Cape Town, South Africa.
Ihe nkiri a nwere ihe ngosipụta mbụ ụwa ya na  Cinequest Film Festival  nke afọ 2020 ma gosikwa ya na ụlọ ihe nkiri nke Sitges Film Festival, Fantasia Film Festival, Grimmfest na Fantaspoa
e gosikwara ya na South Africa RapidLion Film Festival nke ọ nwetara ihe nrite atọ
Na Machị 2021, ekwuputara na Shudder nwetara ikike nkesa ihe nkiri ahụ iji wepụta ihe nkiri ahụ na North America, United Kingdom na Ireland, yana Australia na New Zealand na Mee 6, 2021
